articles.content: India's domestic side Bengal and Pakistan Super League franchise Lahore Qalandars are set to take on each other in September, according to a report from ESPNCricinfo. Bengal, who have been one of the… [+1842 chars]

articles.title: Rahane asks for movie, web series suggestions on Twitter, gets brutally trolled - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Ajinkya Rahane was on the received end of some brutal trolling on Twitter as fans lashed out at him for his poor form.
articles.content: Having recently lost his place in the Indian team due to poor form, Ajinkya Rahane seems to be taking his time to get back to cricket. Currently back at his home, Rahane took to Twitter to ask fans f… [+2319 chars]

articles.title: Indian Cricketer Mohammed Shami Brings Home The Jaguar F-Type - carandbike
articles.description: Mohammed Shami has brought home the Jaguar F-Type coupe in the Caldera Red colour scheme, right after a successful England tour.
articles.content: Indian cricketer Mohammed Shami recently concluded the England tour, wherein he became the joint-third fastest bowler to take 150 wickets in ODI history. Celebrating the new record in style, the ace … [+1624 chars]
